thread.title: Is Facebook’s Digital India profile photo really support for its Internet.org?
thread.title_full: Is Facebook’s Digital India profile photo really support for its Internet.org? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Is Facebook’s Digital India profile photo really support for its Internet.org?
text: Last night before the town hall at the Facebook HQ, Prime Minister Narendra Modi and CEO Mark Zuckerberg modified their profile photos to show support the Digital India initiative. Soon many users on Facebook modified their own profile photos to express their support. But a little digging around by a Reddit user has uncovered a rather unpleasant truth. Reddit user techaddict0099 shares a photo of an alleged code behind the modified profile photos, which includes a particular line – ‘internetOrgProfilePicture__prideAvatar’. The mention of Internet.org in the code is a tad suspicious, since the only reason behind the modifying the profile photo was to express support for Modi’s Digital India. Zuckerberg’s Internet.org initiative has come under fire for its anti-net neutrality »
